review_text: A sweet cottage in an excellent location, this was a fantastic base to explore the region. Robert was massively helpful both before and during our visit and we will definitely be back.
Great place to stay! Robert was super responsive, and the house is very cute!! You will also be greeted by the sweetest cat Mr. Clyde, the “Mayor of Pine Street” (belong’s to their neighbor). :)
We absolutely loved our stay at the cottage. It was conveniently located to downtown Napa, a short walk to restaurants and shopping. The house was charming and comfortable. Fantastic beds!

One of our most enjoyable stays at an airbnb ! Perfect cottage providing all we needed for our vacation in the wine country, and a great location. We hope to visit again on our next visit to Napa. Thank You.

Cute quaint house with friendly neighbor cat, Garfielda ;) The welcome binder has wifi info and how to find the light switch for the dining room light which is not obvious. We did a load of laundry and used the iron without any issues. Sweet welcome bottle of wine, goat cheese, and crackers!

The cottage was adorable, had a vintage feel and very livable. Good for a family of 4 for a long weekend. Walking distance to downtown Napa, where you can find some great shops, restaurants and bars. Hosts were reliable and responsive. Thanks so much.
Cute bungalow. Robert communicated with us during our stay to make sure we were comfortable and if we needed anything. Location was perfect for exploring the area.

Robert’s place is beautiful. It was much larger than the pictures made it seem and was perfect for a group of 4 visiting for the weekend. We loved the front porch and beautiful, private yard out back. Highly recommend Robert’s place!
Stayed here for a wine tasting visit to Napa valley. Offered everything we could have wanted. The beds were so comfortable!

Charming cottage that was walkable to downtown. Everything was clean and comfortable and we all enjoyed our stay. Highly recommend!
The instructions were clear and the host was very communicative.

Loved Robert’s cottage! The location was perfect, walkable to downtown Napa restaurants (everything we needed was a 10-20 minute walk).
Robert was responsive, giving lots of lovely recommendations. We felt comfortable knowing he was one text away. Robert also set us up with goat cheese, crackers, and a lovey bottle of wine which was a fantastic touch!
The only thing we wished was different was the beds - they were a bit stiff for our ideal comfort level, otherwise an awesome stay!

We had a lovely time staying at Robert's vintage cottage. The house was well equipped with everything we needed. The beds were super comfortable. Robert was so kind, responsive and thoughtful even leaving wine, coffee and cheese and crackers. The location was great and within walking distance of downtown Napa. I would highly recommend staying here and will do so again. Cheers

Robert’s cottage was charming, comfortable, well appointed and very walkable into downtown. Robert is a great and attentive host. I will definitely look for availability here first when returning to Napa.

We loved our stay in the cottage! We walked to downtown Napa for dinner most nights and it’s a lovely 15 minute walk. Very cute and comfortable home. The beds were extremely comfortable. Robert is a wonderful host who went out of his way to make sure we had everything we needed. Highly recommend!
Great location right by town, great spot to be after a day at the wineries. Thanks Robert!

We had a great time in this lovely bungalow in Napa! It’s a cute, 2-bedroom / 1 bath cottage with a ton of character. It was so much nicer than staying in a hotel room. We had our own rooms and could watch movies in the cozy living room. The beds were comfortable with enough pillows and there were plenty of pristine white towels. Robert left us a bag of freshly ground coffee and a welcome bottle of wine (+cheese and crackers). Easy to access the site and all the equipment was charming (antique stove, armoires that match the decor, etc.). My only recommendation is to add a microwave. We brought home leftovers from some of our fine dining and would have loved to just microwave vs warm up in an oven or cooktop. All in all - would definitely recommend this bungalow and would love to come back again.

Robert was a wonderful host. This quaint cottage was in the perfect location to act as “headquarters” for our visit to see family. Close to downtown, and in a quiet neighborhood, we had an amazing stay.

Robert's little bungalow was just as described and in a great location to visit wineries in Napa and St. Helena. It was also easy to get to downtown Napa for restaurants and shopping. The bathroom was a little squishy, just as described, but everything worked. It was good to have the instructions on how to use the shower! Thanks for a good visit!
Great spot in a really lovely area! Robert was responsive and hospitable and had great recommendations for what to do! Would highly recommend for anyone visiting Napa Valley

We really enjoyed the stay at the little cottage. I was very pleased with Robert little place and how great of a host he wast. He recommended a bunch of places and left wine and cheese for us to enjoy. My girlfriend and I had a friendly visitor every morning and night. A cat named Clyde I believe. It was great to see him it made our stay even better. I will definitely book here again in the future.

A charming cottage with shabby chic decor throughout. Clean with great facilities and as described (washer and dryer came in handy as this was the final destination for our stay in California!) Private backyard out back and lovely porch in front complete with rocking chairs. Quiet and safe neighbourhood.
Easy parking on the street outside the property. 15 min walk to first street/main street so perfect location for dinner and wine tastings locally. Also walkable to cycle hire and the Oxbow public market.
Robert was very communicative and responsive. Wine and cheese waiting for us was a lovely touch!
Overall a great stay for exploring the Napa/Sonoma wine region. I would recommend it to fellow travellers.

Robert’s place is centrally located very close to downtown.
The house is very well stocked with comfy beds. Unfortunately our stay was cut short due to a medical issue so weren’t able to have the full experience. However Robert was very accommodating.
If we make it back to Napa we would definitely stay again.
Wonderful experience! Cute small cottage vibes. Had a host of games and DVD’s. Made friends with neighbor’s cat who liked to visit the house.

Robert was extremely kind and helpful giving good local recommendations. I loved that the cottage was walkable to town. The cottage itself was so cute, we loved the atmosphere and it was very well set up. Beds are a bit on the small side but very comfortable and the aesthetic of the house is perfect for a weekend Napa getaway! Would come again!

Location, Location!! Walking distance to anything you want. There’s a beautiful park around the corner and a fabulous coffee shop that has delicious bagels around another corner
The cottage is cozy with a kitchen that has all you need.
We will be returning, Thank you.
Great location! Robert is a very responsive and detail oriented host.

My mom and I had a lovely stay. It was quiet, close to everything. We each had our own bedroom. There’s a lot of privacy (lots of natural lights too) and it was really cozy. I would 100% recommend this place. On a side note. We had the pleasure to meet the neighbors cat, Clyde, who was very friendly and came to visit us from time to time.
Robert's cottage was perfect! It was just as described - beds were extremely comfortable! We were able to walk to downtown Napa through lovely, safe neighborhoods.

We had a great time in this sweet, rustic and clean little vintage cottage. Robert left a chilled bottle of wine with cheese and crackers that we enjoyed after check-in. Great walking neighborhood, close to tons of restaurants and shops. Very easy in and out. Will definitely book again!

Adorable home in the heart of Napa. We enjoyed a couple nights there. Robert was a great host and very responsive. We were pleasantly surprised to be greeted with wine, cheese, crackers and coffee upon on arrival. Would definitely stay here again while visiting Napa.
Robert’s cottage was such a charming Napa find! We loved our time here and Robert was an excellent host.

Robert was amazing from the moment i booked. He immediately offered suggestions to help us plan our trip. He was very eager to make sure our first trip to the area was amazing. Even wishing my daughter a happy 21st birthday. The cottage was very quaint and intimate. Even though it was just my daughter and i, i could see this being a perfect place for families and couples alike. There were a ton of games to choose from, a very well stocked kitchen and a cozy back yard to sit and take in the end of your day. I would absolutely choose this cottage again the next time i am in town- which i hope is very soon. Thank you so much for an amazing first visit to Napa.

Our stay in the Cottage was wonderful for our visit to Napa! The home is just as described - quaint, comfortable, with some vintage charm. Accommodations were perfect for two friends on a girls weekend. Robert was helpful and communicative. The location was ideal. We enjoyed our stay and would visit again!
Great host! Adorable little cottage 10 minute walk from downtown Napa. Spacious and lovely.
This place was very cute and quaint. Quiet location very clean and equipped with lots of games. I would return again.
Robert’s home was wonderful! We had a great stay. It wasn’t too far from downtown or the wineries. He was so helpful and quick to respond. I would definitely stay there again!
Robert’s place was perfect for our weekend in Napa. Super close to restaurants, coffee shops, tasting rooms, and the vineyards. Robert was also a very responsive host!
Absolutely beautiful property at the central location of Napa. Very helpful host. Highly recommended!

Great place to stay while we were in Napa. Nice and quiet street and the house had everything you would need. Kids LOVED the large fluffy orange cat that hung around. That was a plus. Would definitely stay there again.

Thank you very much, Robert. Our stay was fantastic. We highly recommend your place!
Anyone who stays will love ambiance and local. Excellent hospitality!
Very kind and communicative. Great location near downtown. Provided a packnplay for my baby niece - thank you!

What a fantastic Napa cottage. It is not hyperbole to say that it is probably the most charming, and clean Air BnB property I have ever stayed in. It really is only a 15 minute walk to downtown Napa restaurants and tasting rooms. Robert was very communicative about check-in and check-out procedures as well as an excellent source of local recommendations. I stayed for a single weekend getaway, but I think it would be the perfect location to base a longer Napa vacation from. I'm not sure when I'll return to Napa, but Robert's cottage will be my first choice. Thank you, Robert!
Great place close to town with everything you need

Great little place. Homely feeling, with everything we needed (extra blankets, many wine glasses, cheese boards, cookware, salt/ pepper, board games etc). Nice quiet neighbourhood, 5 minutes walking distance to great coffee. 25-30 minute walk into Napa.

Robert's home was wonderful! The house was sparkling clean and fully equipped with everything you might need. The floorplan was well laid out and charming. Everything worked perfectly and it was tastefully decorated throughout. Robert was such a considerate host – he provided local information and suggestions to help you explore and enjoy both Napa and the nearby wine regions! The check-in was clear and considerate and Robert made himself available in case of any questions or concerns we might have had. The fantastic location is within walking distance to downtown Napa and the neighborhood was charming. If this home should appear to fill your travel needs then we highly recommend you book this home for a future stay.
Loved our stay! House is darling, cozy with a lot of character. Definitely want to come back and stay longer!
Robert was attentive, location is amazing. The only issue was the shower is a bit hard to use. But other than that, it’s great!! Thanks Robert!

We loved the cottage. It is in a nice quiet area, a little away from the downtown, but easily walkable.
Robert was great at keeping in touch, and his attention to detail regarding all instructions made everything easy. The complementary bottle of wine and the cheese was an added bonus.
We would certainly recommend his place anyone.

My friend and I really enjoyed our stay at this house. It was spotless and a great location. We were able to walk to downtown Napa. It is also very close to grocery stores. Parking was a breeze. The beds are very comfortable. It is a good size for 2 people. We would stay here again.
Cute historic home in the best location! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Cute place walking distance to town
Huge thank you to Robert! The home was perfect all around! 5 stars! Highly recommend.

Robert’s was a very responsive host and the cottage looks exactly as pictured! Cozy and comfortable. Though he mentioned the bathroom might be small for tall people, my husband is 6’6 and did just fine :) the location also is very convenient. We would definitely recommend a stay here!!
Great stay!

Roberts place is Napa was the best! My friends and I had a birthday bash there and it was such a fun weekend! You feel like you’re a Disney princess in his little cottage! Also there was a neighborhood cat we fondly named Gouda who became our best friends while there!
Robert, was a great host. Super helpful with in town suggestions to eat and wineries to visit. He was very responsive as well! Would highly recommended others enjoy this property.

My cousin and I had a great 2-night stay at Robert’s cottage which was so cute, clean and comfortable! Close to downtown and to the wineries. Thanks also for the wine recs, Robert. I absolutely loved PlumpJack!
nice location, and cute house. Defiantly will come back again !!

The Vintage Cottage was exactly as described! It was cozy, comfortable and very quiet...very restful.
Robert was easy to communicate with and responded quickly to questions. The cottage was a perfect compliment to our total experience in Napa.
We would definitely stay here again.
Close to downtown Napa and host was very communicative.
Amazing location close to everything in NAPA. Has everything you need.

This house was so cute and perfectly located to downtown Napa! Robert’s house has everything you need and fully stocked in the kitchen! Robert even left cheese and wine for when we arrived. We definitely will stay again if we’re back in Napa!

We had a wonderful stay at Robert’s cottage! It was a perfect home base for two couples in town to explore Napa Valley. The downtown was easily walkable, with a close by park and beautiful neighborhood. The cottage is lovely and comfortable, affording plenty of space to spread out with lots of interesting indoor and outdoor places to hang out. Robert was so easy to communicate with. He gave great recommendations and was clear in helping us find the place and with check in instructions. We hope to book the cottage again in a return trip!!

This place is cuteeee! I booked for a last minute trip to Napa and couldn’t have been happier with the place. The house is walking distance to downtown Napa, there is everything you could possibly need in the kitchen and there’s a super cute backyard. The beds were small but surprisingly very comfortable. Robert gave me a list of recommendations on wineries and restaurants and even had a welcome cheese and wine waiting for us when we arrived. I will absolutely book this place again for my next Napa trip.

My wife and I stayed here for two nights and had an amazing time. The host Robert, kept in contact with us and made sure that all of our needs were met. He provided us with a lot of information regarding great local restaurants and wineries. When we plan on heading back to Napa, we will most definitely be staying here again.

Our stay at Robert’s was great. The house is in a great, very quiet location and the walk to downtown Napa is easy and very peaceful and scenic- you pass a park and a bunch of really unique, pretty old homes. The house was very clean and was actually more spacious than the pictures suggest. I was a little concerned about parking (we brought two cars) but there was actually more than enough parking available on the street. The house was also well stocked with kitchen ware, bathroom toiletries, coffee, and tons of movies and board games. You can tell Robert really cares about his guests and wants to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. I would definitely come back to stay again.
Super cute cottage

We so enjoyed our stay at Roberts cozy and beautiful cottage. The location was wonderful and it's exactly as described in the photos. If you enjoy a retro vibe, you'll feel right at home here. We loved the comfy beds and appreciated how clean the cottage was. The kitchen has everything you'll need if you'd like to cook or eat in and the neighborhood is really beautiful and peaceful. A quick five minute drive to downtown Napa was just perfect for us and it was nice to have a quiet home to relax in. I'll stay again next time I'm in town!
The cottage location is great! The house is super cute and clean! We loved the little backyard. We felt right at home. I would definitely stay there again! Thank you!

Had such a wonderful girls trip and stay at Robert’s home! We were able to check in early and Robert was so kind and responsive! Location was a perfect quick walk to downtown Napa. The cottage was cozy and a perfect spot!
The house is so charming. Spacious dining/living room area perfect for playing games. Great location. Bathroom is a little small but still provided everything we needed.
Came up to Napa for the night for a concert. Cottage was beautiful and relaxing. Many thoughtful touches.
A wonderful place to stay when we were in Napa. Robert couldn’t have been more helpful and his place was perfect. Many thanks.

Robert is everything you'd hope for in an Airbnb host: communicative, accommodating, and welcoming. The location was walking distance to downtown Napa restaurants, Oxbow market, and the Oxbow river music venue. The cottage was perfect for our 4-person weekend in Napa, and he even welcomed us with some wine, cheese, and coffee. I would recommend Robert and this property to any small group looking to stay in downtown Napa!

The house was very clean and the beds were very comfortable. There were plenty of outlets for electronics. The kitchen was well stocked. And, Robert left us some nice goodies to sip and eat. He is super responsive. The home is within walking distance to downtown, so that helped with deciding how many glasses of wine we could have at dinner 😉
Cute cozy cabin made for a perfect stay!!

Robert’s place was the perfect stay for our Napa vacation! We loved the style of his Airbnb, the beautiful and peaceful backyard to enjoy the outdoors, walking distance to downtown Napa resturant a and shops, not to mention close proximity to both Napa and Sonoma wineries. In addition the comfortable beds and such a clean space! Robert was a great host and extremely responsive. We can’t wait for our next stay here again!

Robert’s cottage is amazing, loved the vintage look!!! It has everything you need. It was very clean and the location was perfect.
Robert was so easy to talk to regarding some requests made. Very accommodating.
Thank you so much for everything. Would gladly recommend your place. 10/10!!!!!
We had an excellent stay. Everything went very smoothly and Robert’s property is very nice and cozy. Definitely would stay again.
Great location, walkable to downtown, quiet and peaceful location. Backyard is shady with a great picnic table.
The cottage was perfect for my family. We enjoyed the vintage charm of the kitchen & loved the outdoor spaces.
I can’t say enough good things about Robert and this house! He made us feel so at home, left cupcakes/wine/cheese for my birthday. The location and house was exactly as described!

Great house.
Robert was very helpful.

Location to lovely park and downtown Napa is stellar! Cottage was super clean and tidy; beds comfy, welcome gifts so thoughtful! Robert is a very communicative host - definitely takes pride in what he does!

Great, cosy airbnb for our weekend in Napa! The house was actually more spacious than we had anticipated, a nice open common area and kitchen separates the 2 bedrooms. A brief 5-10 min walk to downtown Napa and plenty of street parking - would recommend!

Stayed here during bottlerock. was great to be able to have a place in town within a ~15 min walk from the venue. Clean home. Very comfy beds. All the amenities you could want including a lot of board games, an orange juicer and front porch rocking chairs! Robert was very accommodating and responsive.

Robert’s cottage was lovely to stay at over the weekend in Napa. It is located very conveniently in downtown Napa and is close to a wide range of great food options nearby. The cottage was clean and well maintained and we had a great time staying in it. Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Napa!
Great location - right near downtown and close to amazing vineyards/restaurants ! Robert was a perfect host!

Robert’s cottage is just as presented. It was cozy and comfortable for the two of us. The kitchen was well equipped and we cooked breakfast every morning. As noted, the bathroom is on the smaller size, but not a problem at all. We enjoyed sitting on the lovely front porch and the beds/pillows were extremely comfortable, especially after a busy day.
Additionally, we were welcomed by a delicious bottle of wine as well as cheese and crackers. Coffee and creamer were also provided. All were such thoughtful touches.
Robert was incredibly responsive and provided us with a cozy place to stay. The location combined with the amenities make Robert’s place a must!

Robert was wonderful. Responsive.
Very helpful suggestions to wineries and restaurants.
Home was very clean and looked great inside.
Quiet.
Was a fantastic stay! Robert was super accommodating and I would highly recommend this place!
Loved staying in Robert’s charming cottage. It was quaint, clean, and in a great location next to a beautiful park and a short walk from downtown. We will be back, and we will stay again!

We had a great stay at Roberts place. It was centrally located in Napa and east to order Ubers from to head to wineries / restaurants. Robert also gave great recommendations for wineries and restaurants. We went to Silverado vineyards which was one of his recommendations and it was our favorite visit of the day! Highly recommendation his cute place!

Love this little house! It was 4 of us visiting Napa for some wine tasting and this place was a great home base! We had a fun time making fresh squeezed orange juice with the vintage juicer. We also explored their fairly extensive DVD collection! Our favorite part with hanging out with the cat who visited us in the backyard during breakfast!

Robert and his Napa cottage abode were amazing. Would 100% recommend and want to return. House is even larger and nicer than looks in photos and Robert provides wine,cheese, and coffee for guests. Location is wonderful.

Such a cute little home nestled in Napa, minutes from the main downtown and central for winery tours, great food or just peacefully sitting on the porch and watching the day go by. Robert our host was very responsive and proactive to give us recommendations and offer late check out if we needed it. We will certainly recommend this spot to our family and friends.

Robert’s cottage was the perfect place to rest during our quick trip to Napa. It was clean and well-appointed with games, coffee stuff, and a sweet little welcome treat. The location is ideal (walkable to downtown but far enough that it felt quiet and peaceful). We’ll definitely stay here on our next trip!

We loved staying at Robert’s place! The house was adorable and beds were very comfortable. We were in town for a wedding in St Helena and Robert helped us with an early check in and was kind and responsive! Would definitely stay there again :)
The cottage was a great place to stay for a few days. Cozy place, well stocked, and easy to walk to town. We would definitely stay again.

Beautiful, cozy, perfectly-located cottage in Napa! Robert is such a kind host, and left us freshly ground coffee, as well as wine, cheese, and crackers. The house is beautiful and carefully appointed, and the beds are super comfortable. We easily walked to and from downtown Napa. Parking was right in front of the house. Highly recommend staying at this gorgeous house for your stay in Napa!!

Great house and location. Well appointed amenities, walkable to restaurants and shopping. Robert is very responsive and helpful with recommendations. Also nice touch providing coffee, wine and cheese. Highly recommend this home.

We loved our stay here so much. It was my moms 69th birthday and wanted to celebrate in SF and wine country. It was so lovely being able to relax at this home, it had everything you could possibly need. So cozy! We loved watching movies, after our days out. Also I loved Clyde the cat, he was a neighbor cat. Loved seeing him at our porch, made the trip even more special. Would definitely stay again :)
Definitely would stay here again! Beautiful, quiet area & walkable to a lot. Cozy & clean, had everything we needed. Plus Robert was super responsive when we had any questions!

Great place and location. close to downtown Napa. Very cozy and nice touches. WiFi was great, good hot water and comfortable bed. My husband and I enjoyed connecting over some of the board games as well.
Had an excellent stay, great location, easy uber to everything or short walk to downtown.

Cute, warm, welcoming cottage! There was coffee, wine, cheese & crackers to welcome us which was a great start to our wonderful weekend! the beds were super comfortable & the bathroom provided nice hot showers!
Super cute place to stay, my daughters & I thoroughly enjoyed it. Looking forward to our next visit.
Thank you Robert!
Lovely home with so much care. Robert is so kind and helpful. Highly recommend!
Cozy house chock full of board games! Would stay again and recommend to anyone looking for a quiet place in Napa.
Had a great time in this peaceful cottage only 10 minutes walking to downtown Napa.

Guests are advised to be very careful - the bath tub is ancient and sloping down words , the hot water is operated by two levers instead of knobs or dials , the stove is permanently hot due to internal gas - our party was worried about falling in the bathtub, or getting scalded with hot water or fingers on the stove - we didn’t use any of the above and some of us did not take showers
Other items which are inconvenient include - rickety bedroom drawers, no microwave oven . One closed room inside the house . Room
Heaters are unreliable and internet is Tempramental . Our party had issues with all of the above at various times during the stay
I would not repeat my stay at this place , definitely not worth the price on top of the issues

Absolut loved staying here! We instantly felt at home and had a wonderful time with our toddler and infant (kudos for having a crib for the baby!) at Robert‘s Airbnb. We would definitely recommend this place and can‘t wait to stay here in summer.
Roberts’s place was exactly as described. We had a great stay!

my husband and I stayed at the cottage for 2 nights after I ran the california international marathon in sacramento and it was the perfect place to relax. quiet, comfortable, ideal location, well stocked - A+ all around. perfect place for some r&r while at the same time easy to get to all the great wineries and restaurants the area is known for. we’ll be back for sure.
No complaints what so ever. Clean, comfortable and would recommend to anyone looking for a Napa getaway.
Great place to stay and very convenient location! Robert is very quick in responding and provided great recommendations on things to do in Napa
Location - great! Communication - excellent! Really enjoyed our stay at this cute cottage and the bed was sooo comfortable. Thank you, Robert!

Great location for walking into downtown Napa. Never did any cooking but there was a nice size kitchen to prep meals in. No microwave to heat up leftovers though. Bathroom is as stated in description very small so anyone over 5’8” will struggle using it. Was nice to have a washer and dryer for this section of my travels to get caught up on my laundry. Would stay again for sure. It’s a cute lil cottage with a very friendly neighborhood cat.
Everything was amazing. We had such great laughs playing the games the host provided. Loved the location. Will stay here again
Such a nice quaint BnB in a great location in Napa. Easy check in and extremely comfortable. Would definitely reserve again.
Cute cottage! You get the real Napa feel while being so close to down town Napa. Robert was a great host and the neighborhood cat Clyde night wander up on the porch expecting some TLC.
Great central place to stay for exploring the Napa Valley.

Roberts place was perfect for our party of 4. Very quaint cottage with plenty of space to be comfortable. The neighborhood was very quiet, close to downtown area and felt safe. We found the home very clean with plenty of towels and extra amenities. We even received a bottle of wine upon arrival, which was perfect! The backyard was set nicely for an evening night cap. I highly recommend it and would definitely stay again.

Vintage Cottage is totally charming. Robert has stocked it with a heap of maps and local info guides. The kitchen has everything and the dishes and pots are top notch. Beds are comfy and the shower is great. Close to many restaurants and tasting rooms in town. A perfect place to stay.

Would highly recommend! We loved our stay here. Everything was perfectly in order for check in. The home is filled with wine tasting books to study while away from the vineyards. The home is charming and Robert organizes everything for a comfortable stay.
Wonderful, cozy place to stay with lots of charm and character. Very close to downtown Napa.
Great cottage walking distance to downtown Napa.

Absolutely loved our stay here! Location is perfect; centrally located on a quiet street and you can easily walk into town. The space was super clean and well-equipped with everything we needed throughout our stay. Our favorite part was the fenced in backyard. Such a relaxing respite after a long day of sight-seeing and wine-tasting. It was very tranquil and relaxing. We loved cooking in the kitchen and using the grill in the backyard. Robert was super communicative and and helpful. Highly recommend!!
Enjoyed staying at Robert’s house. The location was convenient to downtown Napa, a 5 minute drive. It was clean and comfortable.

We absolutely adored our time at Robert's cottage. The location was perfect and the space was great to return to after a day out. There were plenty of games and a well-stocked kitchen. The backyard space was cozy and the beds were comfortable. Thank you for the wonderful stay!
Robert was an amazing host. He made sure we had everything we needed including restaurant ideas and even made sure we had a great parking spot. Would definitely stay in this adorable cottage again.
A beautiful vintage cottage in Napa. One of my favorite Airbnbs!
I booked Robert’s place based on all the positive reviews and they pretty much sum everything up. Thank you!

Robert's place had all the things we needed for a short 2-night stay. I was in town because I was attending a Women in Sales Summit, and I brought along my husband, so it was important he could comfortably work from the Airbnb and have a strong internet connection. While I had issues connecting to the Wi-Fi (my company's IT department has more strict guidelines on what networks we can connect to), my husband had no issues connecting and working from Robert's place.
The only issue was the next door neighbor came home late of the nights during our stay, and they were super loud. But that's not Robert's fault at all. Other than those neighbors on that night, the neighborhood is quiet and safe. If we're ever in Napa again for more than a day trip, we'd love to stay again.
Great location and house. Robert was so helpful, hospitable, and communicative. I will definitely be recommending this to anyone coming to Napa!

The cottage was perfect for our two night stay in Napa! It’s walking distance (10-15 minutes) to all of the downtown restaurants and nightlife which was fantastic after a day at wineries. Robert was helpful every step of the way - from having parking ready for us at an earlier than expected check in time to recommending places for us to go - during the Napa part of our trip and beyond. The best part is Clyde - the friendly cat that greets guests at the cottage! The cottage is an older, somewhat rustic home - but it has charm and is a very convenient spot for a Napa stay.
Robert's house was beautiful and very clean. We enjoyed the neighborhood and we could walk to the little shops for coffee. Robert was very responsive and we really enjoyed our stay in Napa.
This cottage was perfect for our weekend in Napa. Robert was so easy to work with and the wine and cheese was icing on the cake!
Such a lovely little cottage in Napa! Perfectly charming and had everything we needed. Would definitely book again!
Great location, clean and comfortable and a great value!

We loved our stay at Robert’s place. He was so helpful and the cottage was such a great stay. We owned a 100 yr old house for a few years and it reminded us of home. We had a wonderful time. The beds were very comfortable and the kitchen had all you need to cook a good meal. Robert was one of the most helpful hosts I have had on Airbnb thus far. Very happy with the experience would stay again.
Great place to stay. Was perfect for a romantic couples trip. Robert was a great and very helpful host. Would definitely stay again next visit!

Robert is quite the host. Plenty of towels and such comfortable beds. We happily found that Robert left us a bottle of wine, delicious cheese and crackers in the fridge. What a treat. Each morning we hung out at the front porch drinking coffee he left for us to make and visited with the beautiful neighborhood cat Senor Mayor❤️ These little touches made our stay more enjoyable. During our visit we walked Into town where we explored different restaurants for breakfast or dinner or maybe just a glass of wine. But everything we needed was a quick walk while enjoying the different Victorian style homes on the way. This house made our stay a happy trip. Thank you Robert.
Adorable cottage walking distance to downtown Napa. We loved the cozy backyard and comfy couches in the living room.

We stayed at Robert’s cottage for 4 nights and it was perfect for us. As mentioned in the other reviews, Robert is kind enough to block off a parking space in front of the house for his guests which is extremely helpful. Beds are comfortable, location is great (easily walkable to town) and coffee/wine/cheese are provided. We loved the backyard and were happy when the mayor stopped by to say hi. That’s Mayor Clyde the Cat! We would happily stay at the cottage again.

An absolute dream stay in Napa! Casita Rosa is a lovely home and is perfectly appointed for our family vacation - the rooms are light and airy, the patio inviting for relaxing and enjoying a meal, the kitchen easy to navigate with all the essentials. The location is perfect to nearby attractions and a lovely park for our daughter. Great communication and seamless process to checkin and check out. Hope to stay here again soon during our next Napa getaway!

Great location and super close to downtown! The house was clean, has a beautiful layout, high-end furnishings and appliances. Francesca and Mark checked in on us the first day to make sure we were settled and had everything we needed. We traveled with 2 kids and would highly recommend this lovely house for a family trip to Napa.
Excellent location.

the place was beautiful and well located. we loved the detail for the decor as well as amenities (Jacuzzi, hot tub, big back yard etc). we had a great time and will definitely look to come back here again.

A perfect downtown Napa stay. This is one of those places that makes AirBnB work. This will be our go-to every time we can make a trip to Napa. The house is exactly as shown in the photos and more. The interior renovation is very nice and the kitchen makes it feel better than being at home. The host is extremely responsive and every provision is made to ensure a seamless stay. A must for any Napa excursion!

Great space to stay. Very clean and well organized. We loved coming back here after a day of wine tasting to enjoy the hot tub and a game of corn hole. The kitchen was well stocked and space was very comfortable. Super close and easy to access all of Napa’s attractions.

This home is beautiful! Accurate photos. My favorite was the kitchen are and master bath! The kitchen appliances are super nice and made our stay very comfortable. Location is super peaceful and prime location to explore all of Napa and parts of Sonoma (major wineries and restaurants are 15 mins away). Francesca and Mark are super thoughtful hosts providing us with all the amenities ever needed! Although we didn’t have time to use the hot tub, we were able to use the hot bath to relax during our stay. Thank you Francesca and Mark!
Great home right by town. Clean house, easy parking, great back yard. We will definitely be back!

We had an absolutely amazing stay at Casita Rosa! Francesca & Mark are wonderful hosts who are very responsive and the entire experience was pretty pleasant. The property was beautiful and is conveniently located in the heart of downtown. Will absolutely book again the next time we are out in Napa.
Fantastic place. Convenient.

Casa Rosita was Ekberg up. Conveniently located on a quiet street and a quick walk to downtown restaurants & shops. The decor is lovely & it’s very spacious. State of the art kitchen & a huge backyard. The hosts are super helpful & responsive for anything you need.
Absolutely gorgeous home. Very comfortable and great location. It had everything we needed, would stay here again.

What a wonderful experience at La Casita the house was easy to find in a great quiet residential neighborhood witch we loved. Close to everything. An ample house with great upkeep and furnishings everything was spotless. Amazing backyard! Truly a top-notch experience in a great area!!!!
Thanks a lot and will definitely be returning in the future!!!!

We stayed here with our 3.5 year old and 9 month old. Great location. Very clean, comfortable and stylish place. Cute outdoor area in the back. Francesca and Mark were great hosts and checked in with us right away to see if we needed anything!
Beautiful home with very nice finishes and fantastic location. The house everything we needed for a relaxing stay. Very easy check in and out as well. Would definitely recommend or return here!
We had such a good time! The house is VERY clean with great amenities (we loved the hot tub!). GREAT location- walking distance to downtown Napa. Would definitely come back!
Francesca and Mark were wonderful hosts! Such a cute home in the perfect location for a Napa trip!

Gorgeous home in a perfect location. Very clean and beautiful. Walking distance to downtown Napa and some wonderful restaurants.
Everything worked great - the kitchen is stunning. The owners were easy to reach. I hope to stay again.
Great!
Amazing beautiful place to stay in Napa. We would highly recommend it and “ frogs Leap” winery.

This was one of the nicer Airbnb's we've stayed at. The kitchen is absolutely beautiful, looks even nicer in person. The backyard is set up great with corn hole and bocce set up. There's also a hot tub which we didn't have time to use but it was tempting. The house is super clean, very centrally located (1min to the highway or downtown, 15 mins from Yountville/Oakville wineries, etc) and checking in was a breeze. Would definitely stay again!

Absolutely beautiful home in the most convenient location. Staying here really made my trip to Napa feel luxurious! And the hosts were so accommodating and courteous by allowing for early check in. Would 100% stay here again

What a beautiful place, where modern meets a pastoral setting. The place was in pristine condition right out of a RH catalogue. Beds are very comfortable and the kitchen was perfect for preparing breakfast before our long days in the valley. The distance to down was just right with us walking to downtown on multiple nights for dinner. We definitely plan to come back!

Beautiful newly renovated house in close proximity to some of the best restaurants in Napa, or use the gourmet kitchen for a great stay at home meal. Great location for a weekend get away to enjoy the vineyards of Napa Valley.
Amazing home. Perfect location. Will definitely be back.

Lovely house that is centrally located in Napa. We walked to the down town area easily for food, wine tasting and shopping. House is decorated nicely, comfy beds and all the amenities needed for a weekend in wine country.
Francesca & Mark’s home was beautiful, clean, and they were great to work with. 5 stars all the way around!
This was such an incredible experience!This house was amazing, location was perfect and the neighborhood was lovely. Highly recommend!
Great location and wonderful hosts! Beautiful home!

Two bedroom, two full bath, full kitchen, dining room, living room as advertised. Total space is about 1,650 square feet with an outside deck and hot tub which was hot, but we never got around to it. 15 minute leisurely walk to downtown was perfect for us. Lots of restaurants, bars and tasting rooms on easily navigable streets which felt very safe.
The house has everything that you would need. Full size fridge and dishwasher as well as HVAC and is fully stocked with small wares.
If there was a downside, I would say that one bedroom is like a 5 star hotel. The second one less so. It was a noticeable difference.
We had a great time in a great house.
Incredible place. Centrally located. Clean and the hot tub is great.

Beautiful interior in a great location within walking distance to the bars and restaurants downtown. A great outdoor space as well to relax in.
Would definitely stay again when in napa.

This Napa house is a gem! It is so beautifully appointed, and was super comfortable for our group of two couples. We were in town for BottleRock music festival, and it was a wonderful home base. We walked to and from the venue (a long but totally manageable walk), and we so appreciated the quiet neighborhood and a morning hot tub soak before the long concert day. Just beautiful!
We would absolutely stay here again!
The house was beautiful, nice neighborhood close to everything. We would definitely stay there again.
Beautiful house, even better than the pictures. This was in such a convenient location and yet we spent so much time at the house because it was such a relaxing retreat. Definitely recommend.
Lovely place to stay! Had everything we were looking for in Napa! They thought of anything you might need during your stay! Thank you!
Beautiful, cozy, clean and in an awesome location. Would stay here again!

Mark and Francesca were very lovely and responsive hosts. The home was extra clean and stylish, in a great location. We were able to walk to dinner and during the day we enjoyed the peaceful back yard and hot tub. Highly recommend!

This home is a true gem in downtown Napa! It's close to restaurants and shops in the downtown area and a short drive to many amazing wineries! The house is tastefully designed and laid out. I would definitely stay here again!

We had a lovely stay at Francesca & Mark’s home near downtown Napa. Their home was perfect for our family of four (2 adults and 2 little kids). It has a nice modern kitchen with high end appliances (6 burner gas stove, Sub-Zero refrigerator), including a stacked washer and dryer. A microwave, coffee maker and toaster were also available. Plenty of dinnerware and glasses and utensils and cooking tools. Nice modern marble dining room table that can seat 8 comfortably. The living room was roomy and had a widescreen television with ROKU, that had NetFlix, Hulu, AmazonPrime subscriptions. The backyard was well-equipped with a gas BBQ, area for bocce, cornhole and other outdoor games, as well as a large hot tub that could seat 6-8 people. The primary bedroom has a king size bed - very comfortable with nice linens. The en-suite bathroom has a jetted tub. The second bedroom, located at the front of the home has a full or queen size bed that was also very comfortable and also has nice linens. The en-suite bathroom has a nice shower in it. Both bathrooms were outfitted with nice plush towels, nice soaps and hairdryers. It’s located within walking distance to downtown Napa so it was easy to get to the restaurants, bakeries and all the shops downtown without having to drive and find parking. Overall, it’s a great place to stay and the hosts were very helpful and easily accessible.
Great communication. Spacious, clean home that had everything we needed. Located walking distance to downtown. Jacuzzi in back was an awesome bonus. Our family enjoyed our stay.

Such a beautiful home and great location! The owners made sure everything was set up prior to our visit and checked in with us to ensure we were all settled in and that there were no issues. Thanks so much!
House is in a great location with a very comfortable environment. Highly recommend!

My wife and I stayed in this cute home with her parents. It was well located and very nicely renovated. We spent a lot of time out back enjoying the cornhole and playing cards. It was a great jumping off point for hitting up wineries and for nice meals in town. Very nicely renovated and perfect for two couples. Would recommend.

Beautiful home in a perfect location - walking distance to downtown Napa, coffee shops, etc. The garden and backyard were both amazing as well! The home was extremely clean and well kept. Great common areas to gather in and a huge kitchen. Thanks again for a lovely stay!
Gorgeous home. 5 star all the way. Magnificent kitchen!!
Beautifully updated and we enjoyed the yard out back!
Clean, beautiful, stylish home with every amenity and thing you can think of! We enjoyed our momcation here! Close to downtown Napa and would absolutely stay here again!
Francesca & Mark were great hosts. The place was exactly as pictured and was a fabulous stay. Would highly recommend to others, thank you for hosting us!
Wonderful Home! Better than expected. Location is fantastic. Hope to visit again.
You won’t find much better place in Napa for the price. Amazingly beautiful with a beautiful kitchen, bedrooms etc. A++
Really not much to say except that the property alone is worth a trip to Napa. Without a doubt the nicest Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in.
Francesca and Mark’s place was fantastic - super clean, lots of room and convenient to everything Napa has to offer! Be sure to check out the parks nearby if you have young kids!
Thank you - we really enjoyed our trip and will be back soon

We had a delightful stay here! The location was conveniently close for our needs and felt very safe; most restaurants were only a few minutes drive or a short walk away. The house is spacious and well decorated with lots of bright, natural light from the windows and sunroofs. The appliances are all modern, so we felt comfortable using them. Temperature control was easy using the nest, dishwashing and laundry was very intuitive, and the gas stove and refrigerator both seem industrial-grade. The bathtub in the master bathroom was larger than I expected, and the jets on it were enjoyable too. Towels were abundant, clean, and fluffy; even the Charmin toilet paper was noticeably great quality! The hosts were also very responsive for any questions that came to mind. We couldn't have asked for more on our Napa getaway.
Beautiful home & kitchen. The master is lovely and the place is thoughtfully designed. Walking distance to downtown!

Francesca and Mark’s place was so lovely to stay in and so central. The kitchen was a great size and wonderful to cook in. Their home felt very clean which is something I definitely look for in the Airbnb’s I stay at. They were extremely responsive and easy to work with and even checked in on us to make sure we had everything we needed. Would definitely recommend and stay here again!!

This home was perfect for what we needed. It offered a relaxing getaway, was so close to a spa, restaurants, and wine tasting. We cooked a fair amount in the house and it had everything we needed. The master suite is so luxurious and we absolutely loved our stay. Hot tub in the back was the icing on the cake. We will definitely be back, we loved exploring Napa and walking everywhere from the house!

La Casita Rosita is a superb base for exploring Napa Valley. The bungalow is fantastic: upgraded, open, excellent light, functional & high end kitchen, and overall filled with subtle design touches that show a real desire by the owners to create a superior guest experience. And as nice as the website photos are, the property shows even better in person. Communication with the Francesca and Mark was excellent, the check-in process seamless, and, finally, we were happy to see that even the little details were accounted for, e.g., plenty of toilet paper, paper towels, napkins, etc. that are often overlooked by other hosts. We will definitely plan to stay again for our next trip the Valley.

Absolutely fantastic! The pictures don’t do this home justice. It looks like a restoration hardware catalog. The chef’s kitchen was perfect for our 3 nights. We decided to cook all of our meals in to take advantage of the house. The beds were comfortable, the back yard is large and private, and the layout is great for 2 couples. Only a few blocks from downtown, we walked down every morning for a cup of coffee and shopping. I highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone in the Napa area! We will definitely be back!

I really enjoyed the opportunity to enjoy my weekend at this beautiful home. I also loved that the house was exactly how the pictures were. The home was very clean and very much up to par. Francesca and Mark were awesome. Very quick with responding. Very welcoming. Can’t wait to come back for a much longer needed stay.
Beautiful, relaxing, quiet home in downtown Napa.

The home was great. Spacious living areas. Comfortable all around. Second bedroom is slightly small, but it worked fine for us. Hot tub was a nice touch. The house had everything we needed, including a washer and dryer. Easy to find. Even though it was chilly, we were able to walk downtown to restaurants and shops. Would absolutely stay here again.

This property is absolutely fantastic!
The location was just about as good as the house itself. The drive to most wineries was 10-15 minutes and the house could not have been cleaner.
Highly recommend!

What a relaxing property! Just what we needed.
My husband booked this home for my birthday getaway (last minute plan) and Francesca & Mark were very responsive to all of his questions. They are excellent hosts and made sure we had everything we needed to be comfortable in their home.
We were absolutely blown away by the house; stylish, modern and more gorgeous in person than the pictures posted here.
The home was CLEAN, spotless clean including the table, chairs and hot tub that was outdoor. Documentation was spot on with all information in a single binder which made our stay effortless. The instructions were clear for entry, wifi, hot tub operation, jacuzzi, grill operation etc.
Amenities were plentiful and the home had natural light in the day. Pictures posted are accurate. Master bed is very comfortable, the bath tub is amazing!
The kitchen was stocked; coffee, spices, plates, silverware, bowls, mugs, pots, pans and different glasses for wine, cocktails, etc. It had everything we needed to cook our meals.
My husband also hired a private chef to cook us a birthday lunch and he did a wonderful job as the kitchen was adequate for him to prepare a four course meal. He also set up a wine tasting experience for us at the bar counter.
We will always remember our stay and will love to come back in the future.
Definitely recommend this property :)

This was, without a doubt, the most amazing Airbnb I have ever stayed in. The pictures are beautiful and they don't do the home justice. It is an experience to book and enjoy this beautiful home. Our hosts were very responsive and communicated with us throughout our stay. The home will surpass all your wildest dreams. I would recommend staying with them if you are coming to Napa for work or play. I hope to be back again soon to enjoy their amazing home.

Francesca and Mark were excellent hosts! The house was extremely beautiful and comfortable. We loved all the amenities that were included, which made the stay extra special. Excellent location, close to downtown. Communication ran smoothly, and hosts were more than willing to help. Would highly recommend this stay to friends and family. Thanks again for a wonderful time!
This place is magnificent and is the perfect place for a quick getaway to Napa. You are so close to downtown and the amenities in this place are truly wonderful.

Francesca & Mark's home in Napa is a beautiful place for a weekend getaway. We spent most of our time at the house since the restaurants and wineries in the area were only open for take-out due to COVID-19. It is a very short walk to downtown Napa. We loved the open floorplan and beautifully decorated interior of the home. Francesca & Mark were very responsive to our questions. Hosts are inflexible with assistance animals (ESA) in the home even if documentation is provided.
This house was amazing and the location was awesome!

Beautiful home in a great location! We would have given 5 stars if the furniture was more comfortable. The two couches in the living room are too low and broken down to be comfy and the master bed is so high I had big trouble climbing (jumping) in. The bed was comfy once I got in so maybe providing a stepping stool or somehow lowering the bed frame would be great! Francesca and Mark were very easy to work with and very fast with communication - they get 5 stars! If they upgrade the couches we’ll be back!

This place was so lovely and romantic! The design detail throughout the house makes it feel so luxurious. The location is also perfect. It’s close to the main downtown area and wineries. Francesca and Mark were very responsive and accommodating! Highly recommend booking this place for your next Napa trip!

I had a wonderful stay, the house is absolutely beautiful and clean. Everything I needed for a relaxing getaway. The host was attentive but not bothersome. It was easy to find and located on a well kept quite neighborhood. I will be returning in the near future.

We truly loved the home. This was our first ever Air BnB stay — and i’m scared to try any other places for fear that they won’t be able to compare. So awesome. Loved every part of the property!!! And the proximity to downtown was just perfect.

Francesca and Mark’s Napa home is one of a kind. Beautiful in every way. Home is well taken care of with true Napa style with a great touch of new modern attributes. If you are looking for a nice place to stay to enjoy Napa in a great location, this is the home! This home is very comfortable and makes you feel right at home.
Gorgeous, clean place with everything we needed. The bed and pillows are magic. We would love to stay here again!
We had a wonderful stay in this beautiful home. We will be back again!
Thank you so much for everything! We are so happy to have found your home for future stays! Beyond better than imagined :)
Great location and beautiful home! This is a must-stay in Napa! The hosts were very responsive and hospitable. We will definitely be back.
Great location, fully stocked kitchen and home! Hot tub was a plus! Great communication with host.
This spot was perfect for us. Lesley was very responsive and helpful. Would recommend
Thank you to Leslie for a wonderful stay in her home. The apt was pristine and Leslie and her little dog were so gracious. We would be happy to book again.

Lesley is the most amazing host. She is literally a ray of sunshine. One of the kindest people I have encountered. The place is fantastic. She’s done a beautiful job furnishing and outfitting the room.
I will come back. Often.

Wonderful place with an amazing location. The home had every small detail to make your stay as comfortable as possible, from fancy chocolates, to the fanciest toilet paper I have ever seen. We enjoyed our stay very much.
We loved everything about Leslie’s apartment! It is cozy, clean, and safe! Beautiful backyard for morning coffee or evening wine. Leslie is warm and welcoming! Thank you for the stay!!

Lesley is the absolute best host, so kind and welcoming. Her space was perfect for my husband and I - very comfortable, clean, and accessible to downtown Napa and to the wineries. We would absolutely stay here again.

Absolutely adored our stay and time at Lesley’s home. We were welcomed so nicely and allowed early check in which was great. It has everything you need for a stay in Napa: close to everything you want to do, parking for a rental car, safe and quite place to come back to in the evening, refrigerator for leftovers and microwave! We appreciated all the extras like shampoo, conditioner, body wash, tissues, q-tips, plates, coffee mugs, etc that were already in the space when we arrived. Lesley is so nice and welcoming! We loved trying her wines when we arrived and of course meeting her sweet little dog!

Lesley’s place is exactly as described and perfect for a weekend in Napa. It is very clean and within walking distance to downtown Napa. Lesley is an amazing host and I would recommend her place if you are looking to stay in Napa.
Lesley and her place were great. Lesley was responsive and provided thoughtful touches. Location was to close to getting around to things.
Great place to stay! Close to downtown Napa. Lesley was very responsive and involved with the property and with our stay. She was very helpful. We loved our stay and will be back!

My stay at Lesley's rental unit was very pleasant. She notified me early in the day that the room was available for early check-in if I was interested in an early check-in which I did take advantage of. It was very nice to have the room accessible since I was already in the area. The room was quaint, clean, and very comfortable with all amenities provided and well stocked. Due to Lesley's great emphasis on providing a relaxing stay she does not assign check-out chores which I appreciated greatly. Lesley even went the extra mile to mail belongings that my daughter left behind in the room. We could not have asked for a more helpful, kind, and accommodating hostess.

We visited Napa for a fun girls trip, and Lesley’s place was perfect! Her place is conveniently located by downtown Napa and the highway. From check in, to welcome drinks and a happy hour beverage, Lesley was accommodating and kind.
The neighborhood is quiet and private. Her backyard is so nice to relax and enjoy the weather.
When we return we’ll be sure to reach out.
Lesley takes care of her guests. Great communicator, flexible, kind. We’d love to recommend Lesley’s place to our friends and family for a quiet, quaint stay! Very comfortable apartment!
Great Stay! Loved staying there!

Lesley was a wonderful host! Lesley’s home was spotless and looked exactly like the photos. She is so kind and personable and made us feel right at home. Her back patio was always a nice area for evening wine outside. This air b&b is very close to downtown in a quaint neighborhood, you won’t want to leave! A bonus was meeting her sweet pup sza sza which we absolutely loved! Would highly recommend booking with Lesley! We can’t wait to visit Napa again and book with Lesley!!! Thank you Lesley, for making our trip so memorable, comfortable and relaxing!
Wish we could of stayed longer! Lesley was so kind and even greeted us with a glass of wine! Very convenient to all Napa has to offer.
Great location and communication. Highly recommend. And having the EV charger available to charge overnight was a nice bonus!
Had a lovely stay at Lesley’s! Walkable to downtown Napa and easy drive to Yountville and St Helena. The space was cozy and had all the amenities we needed. Highly recommend!
Lesley is the best. Great location. Easy to walk to downtown. Definitely recommend this place.

We had a great stay in Napa! Lesley is a wonderful host - easy to communicate with, has a comfortable and clean place to stay, and is very friendly and helpful. We very much appreciated her greeting, which included a glass of excellent wine! Would definitely return!

Our stay was excellent and Lesley had every possible thing we could need available for us. The location is perfect and so close to downtown while also being a short drive to tons of wineries, restaurants and bars. I would recommend to anyone coming to Napa.
Great stay and Lesley is the perfect host. I would definitely stay with her again another time.
We had a wonderful time in Napa and staying at Lesley’s only enhanced our experience! She is a wonderful hostess. The accommodations were quaint, comfortable, and spotless.

Lesley is a perfect host, friendly, very communicative, responsive, and accommodating. Her apartment is spotless and every detail has been thought through. We had a lovely stay in the comfy bed and very much appreciated the use of her charger for our electric car.

Stop looking, this is the best airbnb in Napa!
Lesley just deeply understands hospitality, with excellent knowledge on hotel equipment and supplies, she guarantees the most comfortable stay in the city.
Not only that! She is the most generous host in have met in years, she gave us a free welcome glass of wine!!
Will definitely try to stay again with lesley, felt at home!

Lesley is a wonderful host, available for questions and reaching out to see if we needed anything several times during our stay. The apartment is sweet, cozy and comfortable. I would definitely recommend a stay while in Napa.

Although we only stayed for one night it was an amazing experience! Lesley and her sweet dog Zha Zha are the best. Lesley was very accommodating and flexible with our check-in time which we really appreciated. She greeted us with a glass of wine and a detailed walk-through of the space. She also provided plenty of recommendations for wineries, restaurants and things to do. We had a wonderful time and look forward to booking the place again in the future. Thanks a million, Lesley and Zha Zha!
Great little spot in downtown Napa. The place was very clean, private, and convenient. We were walking distance from Oxbow and an easy uber from the wineries.
The room, the neighborhood, the tiny dog & Lesley (our hostess) were all 100% darling! Restful stay, walkable location & super-sweet hostess makes us want to return sooner than later!

We stayed at Lesley’s place for 2 nights for our anniversary. This is one of the top Airbnbs we enjoyed: great location, cute and comfortable place, great and welcoming host, and clean and well appointed. The bed was SUPER comfortable too. Lesley met us with wine and a quick tour of the unit. She was extremely helpful and communicative. The place was so cozy and clean and lovely. We’d definitely return!

The accommodations were perfect. Easy walk to shops and restaurants. Centrally located for easy access to highways. Pretty backyard where we sat and had a glass of wine with Lesley.
Highly recommend her Airbnb.

Both Lesley and her apartment were welcoming and beautiful. We were able to drop our bags earlier, she set us up with a reservation at a winery and then offered us a glass of wine, which we happily accepted and enjoyed on the patio adjoining the apartment. Hosts like Lesley are what makes AirBnb a joy.

Lesley was a very friendly and helpful host. The location was walking distance to downtown Napa and in a quiet location. The house/apartment was as described and very comfortable, nice get away. Will definitely be back next time we go to Napa.
We had an amazing week in Napa and Lesley’s place was perfect. The space exceeded our expectations and was an amazing home base to a perfect week of fun.
Lesley was a very welcoming host who goes above and beyond to make your stay comfortable and memorable. The bed was extremely comfortable and all of the linens were top notch. Can’t wait to go back!
Wonderful stay! Lesley was very responsive and helpful in every way imaginable. Checking in was flexible and easy. Place clean and as described. Would stay again!
This is my second visit to Lesley, and we have enjoyed them both so much. The apartment is cosy well equipped. Lesley is just a delight, and I would recommend a stay with her to anyone.

This little place was so perfect! Super cute decor, very clean. The bed was sooo comfy. We we able to walk to dinner and shops nearby. Leslie was beyond a great host! She greeted us with her adorable and sweet little pup we just fell in love with! She was very friendly and we couldn’t have asked for a better stay! Thank you!

Lesley and her place are true gem’s. We were greeted warmly and with a delicious glass of wine. Her place is in such a perfect location - walking distance to downtown and within a 15-20 minute drive from a lot of great wineries. Lesley was such a wonderful host - going above and beyond to make us feel welcomed. The back patio is serine - the perfect place for coffee and a pastry in the morning. We will absolutely stay again and highly recommend to anyone.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! The space was homey and comfortable and we were able to walk from downtown Napa. Lesley was friendly and welcoming. Highly recommend.

The place was beautiful, clean and very cosy. Everything inside had such good taste and was full of details. Lesley welcomed us with some wine which made the beginning of our trip even better. If we ever visit Napa again we will look for this place again! Thank you Lesley!

This was the perfect romantic getaway apartment. Everything looked exactly like the pictures. Lesley and Zha Zha, her sweet dog, greeted us and we would have lovely afternoon wine and snacks together after we visited the wineries during the day. She had great recommendations for breakfast, lunch and dinner and this place felt like it was our own private home. I can’t wait to go back and will definitely stay here again.

We had a great stay at Lesley’s! We felt right at home. Lesley gave us many recommendations for food and wine and even gave us some of her wine during our stay. I had the pleasure of enjoying Lesley’s company with some wine on the private patio during our stay. Her place was clean and the bed was spectacular. Could not recommend her place enough! You won’t regret it!
Lesley was so kind right from the start! We felt like we were staying with a friend not in an air BnB. She greeted us with a glass of wine even. Can’t recommend her place enough!

We recently stayed at Chez sous la Bois and had a great experience! The location is perfect - it's close to many restaurants and shops, so there's always something to do. The bedroom is spacious and comfortable, and the bathroom is clean and modern. Lesley is friendly and responsive, which made our stay even better. I would definitely recommend this AirBnB to anyone looking for a great place to stay in Napa!

Lesley is the kind of host who welcomes you with glasses of wine, and makes you feel right at home, like a family member. She and her pup are so sweet! She recommended one of her favorite wineries, which ended up being one of our new favorites now.
I accidentally spilled coffee all over her beautiful sheets and comforter - I felt SO awful, but she was extremely kind and understanding, and reassured me not to worry. She also was super flexible with both check in and out time - we really appreciated it. She is a sweetheart and we highly recommend her for anyone coming to Napa!
We had a lovely stay here! We got in a bit later than we expected, but we were greeted with a glass of wine and a smile, plus the sweetest tiny dog! Can’t recommend staying here enough!

Lesley’s place was absolutely perfect for our quick stay in Napa! Her and Zha Zha were so welcoming and even greeted us with a glass of wine! Location was very convenient to downtown, as we just walked to dinner by the bay and explored the area. We hope to stay here again next time we’re in Napa! Can’t recommend enough!
Lesley was wonderful & so was the place!

Wonderful place, warm, comfortable, clean, quiet and with all the touches of home. Lesley was amazing host. Location is close enough to walk to downtown Napa and a great spot to launch your Napa area adventures.
Lesley is an amazing, conscientious host and her studio room is the perfect spot for a couple or single Napa visitor. Well appointed, clean, and close to everything.

Lesley's listing is exactly as advertised! She greeted us with a glass of wine and allowed us to park in her driveway (and use her EV charger!) A state of emergency was then declared in Napa, so we asked the host if coming was safe/made sense & if we need to cancel, if they would be willing to provide a refund.
